column4: someone on the forum sent me to the standard linux modem compabitility sites, i say they are not enough, that distros should be specified with modems in lists
oh that's what sudo means
i saw "sudo make" somewhere
linux is taking over my life, i've got 3 books i'm reading on it, plus websites
all this to save a buck not having to upgrade to windows lol
ok i also just always wanted to switch to linux
that's pretty sad, w/ three books and sites and you don't know sudo lol
oh, i glanced at that book...and don't like it
which one don't you like? Unix in a Nutshell?
i looked at linux in a nutshell for about 5 minutes before deleting it
ohh
and OneTruth: well i think the reference books are nice b/c they are portable, right? sometimes i like to just read a paper book
that's good to know too
basically, the more you read, the better
that's why i hurt myself reading so much, and still have more to read lol
and i don't mind being pointed in a direction, i just like ppl to understand that i do research a lot and sometimes need that nudge
well, you just have people pointing you in the right direction of the reading
this tutorial looks good
linux survival? it's fun =)
you just will have to avoid a lot of fun habits
like anime, lol
